amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete a provision that directs the Indian Health Service to allocate contract support funds on a pro-rata basis to all contracting tribes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed as number 18 in the Congressional Record to strike a provision in the bill that directs the Indian Health Service to allocate contract support costs funding on a pro rata basis to all tribal contractors.

action.text: On agreeing to the Parker amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 289 (Roll No. 319).
